verses.verse: וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took שְׁמוּאֵ֜ל <S%H8050><s%> Then Samuel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פַּ֥ךְ <S%H6378><s%> a vial הַשֶּׁ֛מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil וַיִּצֹ֥ק <S%H3332><s%> and poured עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over רֹאשׁ֖וֹ <S%H7218><s%> [it] upon his head וַיִּשָּׁקֵ֑הוּ <S%H5401><s%> and kissed וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him and said הֲל֗וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מְשָׁחֲךָ֧ <S%H4886><s%> hath anointed יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> [Is it] not because the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over נַחֲלָת֖וֹ <S%H5159><s%> heritage לְנָגִֽיד׃ <S%H5057><s%> thee [to be] captain

בְּלֶכְתְּךָ֤ <S%H1980><s%> which thou wentest הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> to day מֵעִמָּדִ֔י <S%H5978><s%> from me וּמָצָאתָ֩ <S%H4672><s%> then thou shalt find שְׁנֵ֨י <S%H8147><s%> two אֲנָשִׁ֜ים <S%H376><s%> men עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> close קְבֻרַ֥ת <S%H6900><s%> sepulchre רָחֵ֛ל <S%H7354><s%> by Rachel's בִּגְב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> in the border בִּנְיָמִ֖ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin בְּצֶלְצַ֑ח <S%H6766><s%> at Zelzah וְאָמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> and they will say אֵלֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> about נִמְצְא֤וּ <S%H4672><s%> are found הָאֲתֹנוֹת֙ <S%H860><s%> unto thee The asses אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הָלַ֣כְתָּ <S%H1980><s%> went לְבַקֵּ֔שׁ <S%H1245><s%> to seek וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> now behold נָטַ֤שׁ <S%H5203><s%> hath left אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> and lo thy father אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> the care הָאֲתֹנ֔וֹת <S%H860><s%> of the asses וְדָאַ֤ג <S%H1672><s%> and sorroweth לָכֶם֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> for you saying מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> What אֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> What shall I do לִבְנִֽי׃ <S%H1121><s%> you

וְחָלַפְתָּ֨ <S%H2498><s%> Then shalt thou go on מִשָּׁ֜ם <S%H8033><s%> there וָהָ֗לְאָה <S%H1973><s%> forward וּבָ֙אתָ֙ <S%H935><s%> from thence and thou shalt come עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far אֵל֣וֹן <S%H436><s%> to the plain תָּב֔וֹר <S%H8396><s%> of Tabor וּמְצָא֤וּךָ <S%H4672><s%> and there shall meet שָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> and there שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> thee three אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H582><s%> men עֹלִ֥ים <S%H5927><s%> going up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> to God בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> to Bethel אֶחָ֞ד <S%H259><s%> one נֹשֵׂ֣א ׀ <S%H5375><s%> carrying שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> three גְדָיִ֗ים <S%H1423><s%> kids וְאֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> and another נֹשֵׂ֗א <S%H5375><s%> carrying שְׁלֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H7969><s%> three כִּכְּר֣וֹת <S%H3603><s%> loaves לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of bread וְאֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> and another נֹשֵׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> carrying נֵֽבֶל־ <S%H5035><s%> a bottle יָֽיִן׃ <S%H3196><s%> of wine

וְשָׁאֲל֥וּ <S%H7592><s%> And they will לְךָ֖ לְשָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> salute וְנָתְנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> thee and give לְךָ֙ שְׁתֵּי־ <S%H8147><s%> thee two לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> [loaves] of bread וְלָקַחְתָּ֖ <S%H3947><s%> which thou shalt receive מִיָּדָֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> of their hands

אַ֣חַר <S%H310><s%> After כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that תָּבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> that thou shalt come גִּבְעַ֣ת <S%H1389><s%> to the hill הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there נְצִבֵ֣י <S%H5333><s%> where [is] the garrison פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וִיהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> become כְבֹאֲךָ֨ <S%H935><s%> and it shall come to pass when thou art come thither שָׁ֜ם <S%H8033><s%> there הָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> to the city וּפָגַעְתָּ֞ <S%H6293><s%> that thou shalt meet חֶ֤בֶל <S%H2256><s%> a company נְבִיאִים֙ <S%H5030><s%> of prophets יֹרְדִ֣ים <S%H3381><s%> coming down מֵֽהַבָּמָ֔ה <S%H1116><s%> from the high place וְלִפְנֵיהֶ֞ם <S%H6440><s%> before נֵ֤בֶל <S%H5035><s%> with a psaltery וְתֹף֙ <S%H8596><s%> and a tabret וְחָלִ֣יל <S%H2485><s%> and a pipe וְכִנּ֔וֹר <S%H3658><s%> and a harp וְהֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> and they מִֽתְנַבְּאִֽים׃ <S%H5012><s%> them and they shall prophesy

וְצָלְחָ֤ה <S%H6743><s%> will come עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> Then ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> And the Spirit יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְהִתְנַבִּ֖יתָ <S%H5012><s%> upon thee and thou shalt prophesy עִמָּ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> them וְנֶהְפַּכְתָּ֖ <S%H2015><s%> with them and shalt be turned לְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אַחֵֽר׃ <S%H312><s%> into another

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> shall be when [תְבֹאֶינָה כ] (תָבֹ֛אנָה <S%H935><s%> abide ק) הָאֹת֥וֹת <S%H226><s%> And let it be when these signs הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לָ֑ךְ עֲשֵׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> unto thee [that] thou do לְךָ֙ אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what תִּמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> as occasion יָדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3027><s%> serve כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> shall be when הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> thee for God עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> and you

וְיָרַדְתָּ֣ <S%H3381><s%> And thou shalt go down לְפָנַי֮ <S%H6440><s%> before הַגִּלְגָּל֒ <S%H1537><s%> me to Gilgal וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I יֹרֵ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> and behold I will come down אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you לְהַעֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> unto thee to offer עֹל֔וֹת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings לִזְבֹּ֖חַ <S%H2076><s%> [and] to sacrifice זִבְחֵ֣י <S%H2077><s%> sacrifices שְׁלָמִ֑ים <S%H8002><s%> of peace offerings שִׁבְעַ֨ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> days תּוֹחֵל֙ <S%H3176><s%> shalt thou tarry עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בּוֹאִ֣י <S%H935><s%> till I come אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you וְהוֹדַעְתִּ֣י <S%H3045><s%> to thee and shew לְךָ֔ אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what תַּעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> thee what thou shalt do

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> happened כְּהַפְנֹת֤וֹ <S%H6437><s%> And it was [so] that when he had turned שִׁכְמוֹ֙ <S%H7926><s%> his back לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> along מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> with שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> from Samuel וַיַּהֲפָךְ־ <S%H2015><s%> gave ל֥וֹ אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> heart אַחֵ֑ר <S%H312><s%> him another וַיָּבֹ֛אוּ <S%H935><s%> came כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָאֹת֥וֹת <S%H226><s%> and all those signs הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> those בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> to pass that day הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he ס

וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> And when they came שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there הַגִּבְעָ֔תָה <S%H1389><s%> thither to the hill וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold חֶֽבֶל־ <S%H2256><s%> behold a company נְבִאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> of prophets לִקְרָאת֑וֹ <S%H7122><s%> met וַתִּצְלַ֤ח <S%H6743><s%> came עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> him and the Spirit אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַיִּתְנַבֵּ֖א <S%H5012><s%> upon him and he prophesied בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> among

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יֽוֹדְעוֹ֙ <S%H3045><s%> And it came to pass when all that knew מֵאִתְּמ֣וֹל <S%H865><s%> before time שִׁלְשׁ֔וֹם <S%H8032><s%> before that time וַיִּרְא֕וּ <S%H7200><s%> saw וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> now עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with נְבִאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> among the prophets נִבָּ֑א <S%H5012><s%> that behold he prophesied וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> then the people אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about רֵעֵ֗הוּ <S%H7453><s%> to another מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What זֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> he הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> has happened לְבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> What [is] this [that] is come unto the son קִ֔ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> Kish הֲגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> also שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul בַּנְּבִיאִֽים׃ <S%H5030><s%> the prophets

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> of the same place answered אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And one מִשָּׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> in it וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> now who אֲבִיהֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> fathers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> it הָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> became לְמָשָׁ֔ל <S%H4912><s%> A proverb הֲגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> also שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> [Is] Saul בַּנְּבִאִֽים׃ <S%H5030><s%> prophecy
וַיְכַל֙ <S%H3615><s%> And when he had made an end מֵֽהִתְנַבּ֔וֹת <S%H5012><s%> of prophesying וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> he came הַבָּמָֽה׃ <S%H1116><s%> to the high place

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said דּ֨וֹד <S%H1730><s%> uncle שָׁא֥וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul's אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> about וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to him נַעֲר֖וֹ <S%H5288><s%> unto him and to his servant אָ֣ן <S%H575><s%> Whither הֲלַכְתֶּ֑ם <S%H1980><s%> went וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> ye? And he said לְבַקֵּשׁ֙ <S%H1245><s%> To seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אֲתֹנ֔וֹת <S%H860><s%> the asses וַנִּרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> and when we saw כִי־ <S%H3588><s%> could אַ֔יִן <S%H369><s%> that [they were] no where וַנָּב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> we came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁמוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H8050><s%> to Samuel

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דּ֣וֹד <S%H1730><s%> uncle שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul's הַגִּֽידָה־ <S%H5046><s%> Tell נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Please לִ֔י מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> what אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> said לָכֶ֖ם שְׁמוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H8050><s%> me I pray thee what Samuel

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> And Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his דּוֹד֔וֹ <S%H1730><s%> unto his uncle הַגֵּ֤ד <S%H5046><s%> He told הִגִּיד֙ <S%H5046><s%> us plainly לָ֔נוּ כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נִמְצְא֖וּ <S%H4672><s%> were found הָאֲתֹנ֑וֹת <S%H860><s%> that the asses וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבַ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> But of the matter הַמְּלוּכָה֙ <S%H4410><s%> of the kingdom לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הִגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> he told ל֔וֹ אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> spake שְׁמוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H8050><s%> whereof Samuel פ
